title: Navam Poya Day observed at Temple Trees
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix By: Nalin Hewapathirana) The Dhamma desana (Buddhist sermon) organized at Temple Trees on every Poya Day was held to mark the Navam Full Moon Poya day today on 17 February 2011. The sermon was delivered by the Venerable Meegaswewe Somarathana Thera, Chief Incumbent of the Gangula Siri Parama…
